alert.note: Alert for Grant Grove Area; Kaiser to Rodgers Ridge; Kings Canyon NP; Sequoia NP; South End of the Upper Sierra (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 04 at 1:00PM PDT until November 09 at 11:00AM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM SUNDAY TO 10 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow fall accumulations of 1 to 2 feet. Isolated amounts of 3 feet above 8000 feet. Westerly winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Kaiser to Rodgers Ridge, Kings Canyon NP, Grant Grove Area, Sequoia NP and South End of the Upper Sierra. * WHEN...From 10 PM Sunday to 10 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Be prepared for significant reductions in visibility with near whiteout conditions at times.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Grant Grove Area; Kaiser to Rodgers Ridge; Kings Canyon NP; Sequoia NP; South End of the Upper Sierra
